Public MustInherit Class CodeActivity Inherits Activity
public ref class CodeActivity abstract : System::Activities::Activity

summary.span: 一种抽象类，用于创建具有强制行为（该行为是使用 方法定义的，利用该方法可以访问变量以及参数解析和扩展）的自定义活动。

span.span: An abstract class for creating a custom activity with imperative behavior defined with the method, which gives access to variable and argument resolution and extensions.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现派生自 的活动。The following example shows how to implement a -derived activity. [!code-csharp[ActivityAction#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/activityaction/cs/messagebox.cs#0)]

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，创建派生类的实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, creates an instance of the derived class.

summary.span: 创建并验证活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托的说明。

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity's arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义活动作者可以在活动的 重写中提供验证逻辑。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 由 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 这些异常将从对 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity's arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流运行时使用 的默认实现来确保工作流构造正确，以及管理运行时关系和生存期规则。The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage runtime relationships and lifetime rules. 的默认实现 使用类型的来检查活动类型的公共成员 。The default implementation of examines the public members of the activity type using the type's . 这些公共成员的类型为 、 、 [IEnumerable \ ](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)、 、 [IEnumerable \ ](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)或 。These public members are of type , , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), or . 您可以重写此方法以自定义活动的运行时说明的生成，并提供自定义验证逻辑。You can override this method to customize the building of the activity's run-time description and to provide custom validation logic. 由 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 这些异常将从对 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为此属性设置值会返回 。Setting a value for this property returns a . 不允许将执行逻辑定义为活动。 does not allow defining the execution logic as an activity. 而是必须通过 方法定义执行逻辑。Instead the execution logic must be defined in the method.
